caption.p: Principal Component Analysis (PCA) biplot illustrating the relationships among the chemical components and five Ocimum spp. Odour active compounds of 1 â€“64 correspond to the code compounds in Table 3. LB = Lemon basil ( O. citriodorum); RB = red Holy basil ( O. sanctum var. Shyama); ThB = Thai basil ( O. basilicum var. thyrsiflorum); TrB = Tree basil ( O. gratissimum); WB = white Holy basil ( O. sanctum var. Rama).
